attributes.action: Declare the Mayoral Election in Tower Hamlets invalid due to wide spread voter intimidation
attributes.additional_details:
It is clear that the electorate of Tower Hamlets have been disenfranchised and that widespread voter intimidation and manipulation has taken place.

The vote must be declared invalid and any candidates with knowledge of these practices must be excluded.

Demand a police investigation followed by a public enquiry.

rejection.details: This is a local government issue.  Suspected crimes of any nature should always be referred to the relevant police force.
